Author: bir_die
Text: When I’m really struggling with wanting to binge, definitely. Like how dare they enjoy their food in moderation and rub these delicious smells in my face.   When I’m having an actually easy time restricting, though, I actually weirdly like it. I’ll even help them cook and have 1 single bite, no problem. It makes me happy.   But, yeah. If I’m Binge Moody, I’m goddamn livid at any form of food.
